name: <%=appname%>
description: Starter kit project with angular2 and webpack

scripts.lint: npm run tslint && npm run eslint
scripts.preionic:platform: npm run check:target:ionic --silent && npm run check:already:built --silent
scripts.ionic:platform: (cd dist/${TARGET-app}/${MODE-dev} && for p in ${PLATFORM-(ios android)}; do for o in ${OPERATION-(rm add)}; do ionic platform $o $p ${OPTIONS}; done; done)
scripts.preionic:plugin: npm run check:target:ionic --silent && npm run check:already:built --silent
scripts.ionic:plugin: (cd dist/${TARGET-app}/${MODE-dev} && for p in ${PLUGIN}; do for o in ${OPERATION-(rm add)}; do ionic plugin $o $p ${OPTIONS}; done; done)
scripts.preionic:run: npm run check:target:ionic --silent && npm run check:already:built --silent && npm run check:ionic:platform --silent
scripts.preionic:serve: npm run check:target:ionic --silent && npm run check:already:built --silent
scripts.preionic:emulate: npm run check:target:ionic --silent && npm run check:already:built --silent
scripts.prefuse:cli: npm run check:target:fuse --silent && npm run check:already:built --silent
npm run check:target:fuse --silent && npm run check:already:built --silent
scripts.error:unbuilt: echo "\x1B[1;30;41mError!\x1B[0m Target \x1B[1;35m${TARGET-app}\x1B[0m has not been built in mode \x1B[1;35m${MODE-dev}\x1B[0m. Please run \x1B[1mTARGET=${TARGET-app} MODE=${MODE-dev} npm run build\x1B[0m and try again." && exit 1
scripts.error:not:ionic: echo "\x1B[1;30;41mError!\x1B[0m Target \x1B[1;35m${TARGET-app}\x1B[0m is not a valid ionic target. Please choose a valid target by setting \x1B[1mTARGET=<ionic_target>\x1B[0m before running the command and try again. If you have not scaffolded a valid ionic target yet, please run \x1B[1myo mcfly-ng2:target\x1B[0m and select ionic." && exit 1
scripts.error:not:fuse: echo "\x1B[1;30;41mError!\x1B[0m Target \x1B[1;35m${TARGET-app}\x1B[0m is not a valid fuse target. Please choose a valid target by setting \x1B[1mTARGET=<fuse_target>\x1B[0m before running the command and try again. If you have not scaffolded a valid fuse target yet, please run \x1B[1myo mcfly-ng2:target\x1B[0m and select fuse." && exit 1
scripts.error:missing:platform: echo "\x1B[1;30;41mError!\x1B[0m No \x1B[1;35mPLATFORM\x1B[0m variable specified. Please choose a valid platform by setting \x1B[1mPLATFORM=ios\x1B[0m or \x1B[1mPLATFORM=android\x1B[0m before running the command and try again." && exit 1
scripts.check:target:ionic: if [ ! -f <%=clientFolder%>/scripts/${TARGET-app}/config.xml ]; then npm run error:not:ionic; fi
scripts.check:target:fuse: if [ ! -f <%=clientFolder%>/scripts/${TARGET-app}/index.ux ]; then npm run error:not:fuse; fi
scripts.check:already:built: if [ ! -d dist/${TARGET-app}/${MODE-dev}/ ]; then npm run error:unbuilt; fi
scripts.check:ionic:platform: if [ -z ${PLATFORM} ]; then error:missing:platform; elif [ ! -d dist/${TARGET-app}/${MODE-dev}/platforms/${PLATFORM} ]; then (OPERATION=add npm run ionic:platform); fi
